promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic crow electric-type pokemon with yellow and teal feathers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or crow. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltacaw, a a dynamic basic crow electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Crush and Burn, Shore Up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "crow", "electric" or "Voltacaw". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, crow-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This avian dynamo thrives in lofty peaks, channeling lightning to scorch foes and mend its rocky habitat with finesse. A true master of sky and stone.
